summary.responsibilities: Develop cutting-edge AI-inspired algorithms for software violation detection and repair; support software developers in delivering reliable, secure, high-value software; package solutions to upskill under-represented groups and address tech skills shortage.
summary.eligibility: Background in software engineering, AI, or related fields.
summary.description: Join us at the University of Otago as a Postdoctoral Fellow on our $1 million project: 'Automating software violation detection and repair: future-proofing software reputation and skills development.'
summary.candidate_requirements: Background in software engineering, AI, or related fields.
